card.name: Buttercup Treat
card.description: Set a non-{{RARITY:DETERMINATION}} monster's {{ATK}} to 1. {{KW:DELAY}}: {{KW:SILENCE}} it. Give it {{KR}}, +1 {{ATK}} and {{KW:CANDY}}.

description.now: Set a non-{{RARITY:DETERMINATION}} monster's {{ATK}} to 1. {{KW:DELAY}}: {{KW:SILENCE}} it. Give it {{KR}}, +1 {{ATK}} and {{KW:CANDY}}.
description.prev: {{KW:PARALYZE}} a monster and give it {{KR}}. If it already has {{KR}}, kill it instead.
